concise_definition: adj. 可听见的, 听得见的

definitions.explanation_en: Capable of being heard; loud or clear enough to be perceived by the human ear.
definitions.explanation_cn: 能够被听到的；声音足够大或清晰，足以被人耳感知。
definitions.example_en: The speaker's voice was barely audible over the noise of the crowd.
definitions.example_cn: 演讲者的声音在人群的喧闹声中几乎听不见。

definitions.explanation_en: Sufficiently noticeable or evident, even if not literally heard; used figuratively to describe something that is obvious or perceptible.
definitions.explanation_cn: 即使不是字面意义上的‘听见’，也指足够明显或可察觉的；常用于比喻意义，形容某事显而易见。
definitions.example_en: There was an audible sigh of relief when the results were announced.
definitions.example_cn: 当结果公布时，人们发出了一声明显的松了一口气的叹息。

comparison.analysis: “Audible” 专指声音能被听见，强调听觉感知的物理可能性。它不用于描述视觉或抽象概念的‘明显’，除非是比喻用法。
